attributes.action: Make all Asthmatics included in the group 6 for the covid-19 vaccine
attributes.additional_details: As an asthmatic patient we should not have to wait for the vaccine that is a killer disease for us Asthmatics.
attributes.background: The government and the JCVI says that if your asthma is controlled or not moderate then you have to wait for the vaccine for covid 19. I find this unfair that us Asthmatics have to wait even though covid-19 is a respiratory disease.
